patthana2.10:1.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:2.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:3.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:4.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:4.1_1: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:5.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā.
patthana2.10:6.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammo uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:7.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:8.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:9.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:9.1_2: sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:10.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:11.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā.
patthana2.10:12.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:13.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:14.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:14.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:15.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:16.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:17.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:18.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā.
patthana2.10:19.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:20.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:21.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:22.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:22.1_2: sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:23.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— sārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:24.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Yāva asaññasattā.)
patthana2.10:25.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:26.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:28.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte nava …pe… magge ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:30.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:31.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:31.1_1: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:32.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sārammaṇā khandhā;
patthana2.10:33.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sārammaṇā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:34.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:35.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:36.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:36.1_2: sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:37.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:38.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:38.1_1: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā sārammaṇā khandhā;
patthana2.10:39.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:39.1_3: sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:40.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:41.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.10:42.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:43.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:43.1_1: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā sārammaṇā khandhā;
patthana2.10:44.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā sārammaṇā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:45.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:45.1_3: ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:45.1_6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:46.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:47.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:47.1_2: ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:47.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:47.1_5: ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā kaṭattārūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:48.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne cattāri, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:50.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava …pe…
patthana2.10:52.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:53.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ (sabbattha ekaṁ), avigate ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:55.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:55.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:56.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā ekaṁ, napurejāte ekaṁ, napacchājāte ekaṁ, naāsevane ekaṁ, nakamme ekaṁ, navipāke ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:58.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:59.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:60.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:61.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:62.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:62.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.10:62.1_6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese …pe…
patthana2.10:62.1_8: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, sārammaṇe khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana2.10:62.1_10: cetopariyañāṇena sārammaṇacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe…
patthana2.10:62.1_12: sārammaṇā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:63.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:63.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:63.1_7: anārammaṇā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:64.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:64.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana2.10:64.1_7: sārammaṇe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:65.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:66.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:66.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—sārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:67.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:67.1_2: nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:67.1_4: vatthuṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:68.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā sārammaṇā …pe…
patthana2.10:69.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:69.1_14: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:70.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:70.1_6: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:71.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:71.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:72.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:73.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:74.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:75.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:76.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:76.1_1: **Sahajātā**—sārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:76.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—sārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:77.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:78.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:79.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:80.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:81.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— rūpajīvitindriyaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:82.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.10:83.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:83.1_1: kāyindriyañca kāyaviññāṇañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:84.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:85.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:86.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:87.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:88.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:89.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:90.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:91.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:91.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:92.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:92.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:92.1_3: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:92.1_5: sārammaṇo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:93.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:93.1_1: **Sahajātā**—sārammaṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:93.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—sārammaṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:93.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—sārammaṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:94.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte dve, atthiyā satta, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate satta.
patthana2.10:95.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:96.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:97.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:98.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:99.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:100.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:101.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:102.1_1: nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, na aññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta …pe…
patthana2.10:102.1_2: namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:103.1_1: nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṁ, naupanissaye tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.10:103.1_2: namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte ekaṁ, navippayutte ekaṁ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:104.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe…
patthana2.10:106.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:106.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:107.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:107.1_2: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe….
patthana2.10:108.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocitte khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:109.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:109.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:109.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:110.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:110.1_1: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:110.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:110.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā;
patthana2.10:110.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:111.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:112.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:113.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nocitte khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:114.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe paṭicca …pe…
patthana2.10:114.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:114.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:115.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:115.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā.
patthana2.10:116.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:117.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:117.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:118.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:118.1_2: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:119.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke nocitte khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:120.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:120.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:121.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:121.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:121.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:122.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:123.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—nocitte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:124.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:124.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:125.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … pañca …
patthana2.10:126.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:126.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:127.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:128.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe nocitte khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:129.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā—arūpe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:129.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:130.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:130.1_1: nocitte khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:130.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā;
patthana2.10:130.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:132.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:133.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—nocitte khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā;
patthana2.10:134.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— nocitte khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:135.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:137.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, anantare pañca (sabbattha pañca), magge tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:139.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:140.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:141.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:141.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:142.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:142.1_1: vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:142.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:142.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:143.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:143.1_1: cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:143.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā kaṭattārūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:143.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā.
patthana2.10:144.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.10:145.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:145.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:145.1_3: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇasahagatā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā nocittā khandhā.
patthana2.10:146.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:146.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ, cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:147.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:147.1_1: vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:147.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:147.1_4: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:148.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:148.1_1: cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…
patthana2.10:148.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:149.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:150.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:150.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:151.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:151.1_3: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇasahagatā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā nocittā khandhā vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:152.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:152.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ, cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:153.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:153.1_1: vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:153.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:154.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:154.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:154.1_5: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:155.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:157.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, anantare pañca (sabbattha pañca), magge tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:159.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:160.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe saṁsaṭṭho eko khandho;
patthana2.10:161.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocitte khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:162.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:163.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:164.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:165.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:166.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi sabbe kātabbā.
patthana2.10:167.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:168.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nocittā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:169.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:170.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cittaṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:170.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha nocittā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:170.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:171.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:171.1_1: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.10:171.1_4: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:171.1_5: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:171.1_6: ariyā nocitte pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:171.1_9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:171.1_14: nocittā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:172.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā …pe…
patthana2.10:173.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ datvā …pe…
patthana2.10:173.1_1: (paṭhamagamanasadisaṁ ninnānākaraṇaṁ, imaṁ nānaṁ), rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:174.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:175.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:176.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:176.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—cittādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:177.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:177.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—cittaṁ garuṁ katvā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:178.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:178.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe …pe…
patthana2.10:178.1_5: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:178.1_6: Phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:178.1_8: vatthuṁ nocitte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:178.1_9: **Sahajātādhipati**—nocittādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:179.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:180.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:181.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:182.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nocittānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:183.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:184.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nocittā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:185.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimaṁ purimaṁ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:185.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimaṁ purimaṁ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nocittānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:185.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimaṁ purimaṁ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:187.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:188.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:189.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:189.1_1: (Ime dvepi pūretukāmena sabbattha kātabbā, paṭhamagamanasadisaṁ ninnānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.10:190.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:190.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:191.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:191.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:192.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:192.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:193.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:193.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:193.1_9: vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:194.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:195.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:196.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:197.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:198.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:198.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nocittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:198.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nocittā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:199.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:200.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:200.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nocittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:200.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nocittā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:201.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … pañca …
patthana2.10:201.1_3: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi …
patthana2.10:202.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:203.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:203.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—nocittā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:204.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:205.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:205.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:205.1_4: vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:206.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:207.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:208.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:209.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:210.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:210.1_1: **Sahajāto**—nocitto eko khandho dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:210.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:211.1_1: **Sahajāto**—nocitto eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:211.1_3: **Sahajātaṁ**—cittañca vatthuñca nocittānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇepi dve).
patthana2.10:211.1_4: **Sahajātaṁ**—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_5: **Sahajātaṁ**—cittañca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇepi dve).
patthana2.10:211.1_6: **Pacchājātaṁ**—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_7: **Pacchājātaṁ**—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_8: **Pacchājātaṁ**—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:212.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:213.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:214.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:215.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:216.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:217.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:218.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:219.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:220.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:221.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:222.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:223.1_1: nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṁ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte ekaṁ, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:224.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava. (Anulomamātikā kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:226.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho;
patthana2.10:227.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:227.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:228.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:229.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:229.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:229.1_2: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:230.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:231.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:231.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:232.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:232.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:232.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:233.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:233.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:234.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:234.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:234.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca eko khandho cittañca.
patthana2.10:235.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:236.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:237.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:238.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:239.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:239.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cetasikā khandhā.
patthana2.10:240.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:241.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:241.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:241.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:242.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:243.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:244.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:245.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:246.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:246.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:247.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:248.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:249.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:249.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:250.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:250.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cetasikā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:251.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:251.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:252.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:252.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:252.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:252.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:253.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ahetuke cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:253.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:254.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:254.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:255.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:256.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:257.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:258.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:260.1_1: purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), magge tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.10:262.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:263.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:263.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paccayā kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:264.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā cetasikā khandhā.
patthana2.10:265.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:266.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:266.1_1: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:267.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:268.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:268.1_1: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:269.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:270.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:270.1_1: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:271.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:271.1_2: cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā cetasikā khandhā.
patthana2.10:272.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:272.1_2: vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:273.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:273.1_1: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:273.1_3: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:273.1_4: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:274.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:274.1_2: cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:275.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:275.1_1: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:276.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), purejāte nava, āsevane nava …pe…
patthana2.10:277.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:278.1_0: (Nava pañhā pañcaviññāṇampi yathā ārammaṇapaccayā evaṁ kātabbaṁ, tīsuyeva moho.
patthana2.10:279.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:281.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:283.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… .
patthana2.10:284.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cetasiko khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:285.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… .
patthana2.10:286.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:287.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… .
patthana2.10:288.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:289.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:290.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:291.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:292.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cetasikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:293.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cetasikā hetū cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:294.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cetasikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:295.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cetasike khandhe ārabbha cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:295.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:295.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ārabbha cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:296.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.10:296.1_2: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:296.1_5: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:296.1_6: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:296.1_11: acetasikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:297.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.10:297.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:297.1_10: acetasikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:298.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.10:298.1_4: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:298.1_6: rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:298.1_8: acetasikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:299.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:299.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:299.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:300.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:300.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—cetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:300.1_3: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) **Ārammaṇādhipati**—cetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:300.1_5: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) **Ārammaṇādhipati**—cetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:300.1_6: **Sahajātādhipati**—cetasikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:301.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:301.1_2: nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa.
patthana2.10:301.1_5: vatthuṁ acetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:302.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:302.1_5: vatthuṁ acetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:303.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:303.1_3: (paṭhamagamanaṁ) acetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:303.1_4: **Sahajātādhipati**—acetasikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:304.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:305.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:305.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:305.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:306.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:307.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:308.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:310.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:310.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ, tīṇi upanissayā.) Cetasikā khandhā cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:310.1_3: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ, tīṇi upanissayā.) Cetasikā khandhā cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:311.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:311.1_9: patthanāya kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:312.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:313.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:314.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:314.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:314.1_4: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:315.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:315.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:316.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:316.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:316.1_4: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:316.1_9: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:317.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:318.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:319.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:320.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:321.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:322.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:322.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cetasikā cetanā cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:322.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cetasikā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:323.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:323.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cetasikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:323.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cetasikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:324.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava …
patthana2.10:325.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:326.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:327.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:328.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:328.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:328.1_4: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:329.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:330.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.10:331.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:332.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:333.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:334.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:334.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:335.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:335.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:335.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:336.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:336.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:336.1_3: cetasiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:336.1_5: **Sahajāto**—cetasiko eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:337.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:337.1_3: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:337.1_4: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:337.1_5: **Sahajātā**—cetasikā khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:337.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:337.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:337.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:338.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:338.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:338.1_2: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:338.1_4: **Sahajāto**—cetasiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:339.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:341.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …

patthana2.10:401.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasampayuttā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:402.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cittasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:403.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:403.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.10:403.1_6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:403.1_15: cittasampayuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:404.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:404.1_1: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:404.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:404.1_8: cittavippayuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:405.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:405.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:405.1_6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, cittasampayutte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:406.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:407.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:407.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—cittasampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:408.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:408.1_2: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:408.1_4: vatthuṁ cittavippayutte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:409.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā cittasampayuttā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:410.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:411.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:412.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:412.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:413.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) ekaṁ, āsevanapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:414.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:415.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:416.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:416.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:416.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cittasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:417.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:418.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:419.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:420.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:421.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— rūpajīvitindriyaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:422.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:423.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:423.1_2: kāyindriyañca dukkhindriyañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:424.1_0: Jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:425.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:426.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:427.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:428.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:429.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:430.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:431.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:432.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:432.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:432.1_2: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
