patthana2.10:432.1_3: cittasampayutto eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:433.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:433.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:433.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—cittasampayuttakā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:433.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—cittasampayuttakā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:434.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte dve, atthiyā satta, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate satta.
patthana2.10:436.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:437.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:438.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:439.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:440.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:441.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:442.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:443.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta (sabbattha satta), nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:444.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṁ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte ekaṁ, navippayutte ekaṁ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:445.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.10:447.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:448.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:451.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:451.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:452.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:452.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:453.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:453.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:454.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:454.1_1: cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:455.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:455.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:456.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:456.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:457.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:457.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:457.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:458.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:458.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:459.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:459.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:460.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:461.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:462.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:463.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:464.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:465.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:466.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:466.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:466.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:467.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:468.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:469.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:471.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:471.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:471.1_3: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:472.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:472.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:473.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:474.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:475.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:475.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:476.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:476.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā khandhā ca.
patthana2.10:477.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:477.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:477.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:477.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:478.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:478.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:479.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:479.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:480.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:481.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:482.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:483.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:484.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:485.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:485.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:486.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe cha, naupanissaye cha, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.10:487.1_1: nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.10:488.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava …pe…
patthana2.10:490.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:491.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:492.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:493.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:494.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:494.1_1: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:495.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:496.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:497.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:498.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:499.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:499.1_1: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇasahagatā khandhā, cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:500.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:500.1_2: vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:501.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:501.1_1: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:502.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:502.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:503.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:503.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:504.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:505.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:506.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe cha, naupanissaye cha, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.10:507.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:508.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:509.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:510.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:511.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:512.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:513.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:514.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:515.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:516.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:517.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:518.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:518.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:519.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:520.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:520.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:520.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:521.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:521.1_2: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:521.1_5: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:521.1_6: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:521.1_11: nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:522.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā …pe…
patthana2.10:522.1_8: nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:523.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā …pe…
patthana2.10:523.1_2: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:523.1_3: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:523.1_6: nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:524.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:525.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:525.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṁ katvā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:525.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—cittasamuṭṭhānādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:526.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:526.1_3: nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:527.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:527.1_3: nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:527.1_4: **Sahajātādhipati**—nocittasamuṭṭhānādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:528.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:529.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:530.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:531.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa …pe…
patthana2.10:531.1_1: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:532.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (tīṇi kātabbā, vuṭṭhānaṁ natthi) …
patthana2.10:533.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo (paṭiccavārasadisaṁ) …
patthana2.10:534.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:535.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:536.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:537.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:537.1_6: senāsanaṁ cittaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:538.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:539.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:539.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:540.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:540.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:540.1_4: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:541.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:541.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:541.1_4: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:541.1_5: Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:542.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:542.1_5: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:543.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:543.1_4: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:544.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:544.1_3: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:544.1_4: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:544.1_9: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:545.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.10:545.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:545.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:546.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.10:546.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:546.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:547.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.10:547.1_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:547.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:548.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā purejātassa imassa cittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (iminākāreneva pacchājāto vitthāretabbo) …
patthana2.10:549.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:549.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:550.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:550.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:551.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:551.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:551.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:552.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:553.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:553.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā cittassa āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:553.1_4: cittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:553.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:554.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:554.1_1: nocittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:554.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:554.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:555.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:555.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:555.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:555.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:556.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:557.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:557.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:557.1_9: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:558.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:558.1_4: kāyindriyañca dukkhindriyañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:558.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:558.1_8: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:558.1_9: cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:560.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:561.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:562.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:563.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:563.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ kaṭattā rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, cittaṁ vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu cittassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:563.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:564.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:565.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:566.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:567.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:568.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:569.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:570.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana2.10:571.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:572.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:573.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:574.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:575.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:576.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:576.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:576.1_4: (paccayavārasadisaṁ paṭisandhipi pavattipi kātabbā sabbesampi pañhānaṁ.) **Pacchājātā**—cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:576.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:576.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:577.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:578.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:579.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava …pe…
patthana2.10:581.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:582.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:583.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:584.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:585.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:586.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:587.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:588.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:589.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:590.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:591.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.10:591.1_1: namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:592.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomagaṇanā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:594.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:594.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:595.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:595.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:596.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:596.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:597.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:597.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:597.1_2: mahābhūte paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:598.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:598.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:599.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:599.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:600.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:600.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:600.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:600.1_3: cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:601.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:601.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ, cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:602.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:602.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:602.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:602.1_3: cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:603.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (arūpaṁ sabbaṁ uddharitabbaṁ.
patthana2.10:603.1_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṁ.) Adhipatiyā nava (mahābhūtā chasupi pañhesu kātabbā, adhipatiyā tīsu natthi.) Anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:604.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:604.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:604.1_6: Tīṇi moho yathā cittasamuṭṭhānaduke evameva kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:605.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca cittasahabhū cetanā.
patthana2.10:606.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bāhiraṁ …
patthana2.10:607.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:608.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:609.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:610.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava
patthana2.10:613.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:614.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ, cittaṁ paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:615.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittasahabhū khandhā;
patthana2.10:616.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:617.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:617.1_1: cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:618.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittasahabhū khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:618.1_1: Cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:619.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:620.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:621.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …pe…
patthana2.10:622.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:623.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:624.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.10:625.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.10:626.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:628.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:629.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhū khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:630.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:631.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:632.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:633.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:635.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca (tīṇi, moho), naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:636.1_0: Itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi sabbaṁ kātabbaṁ.
patthana2.10:637.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasahabhū hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:638.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasahabhū hetū cittassa nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:638.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū hetū cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:639.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:639.1_1: cittasahabhū hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:640.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:641.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:642.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:643.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:644.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:645.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā cittasahabhū khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:646.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana2.10:647.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) …
patthana2.10:648.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:648.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:648.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cittasahabhū cetanā vipākānaṁ cittasahabhūnaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:649.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:649.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū cetanā cittassa nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:649.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cittasahabhū cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:650.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:650.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:650.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—cittasahabhū cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:651.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo (cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṁ) …
patthana2.10:651.1_3: Imampi ekaṁ kabaḷīkāraāhārasadisaṁ.) Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:652.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:652.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:653.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:653.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:653.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:654.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:654.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:655.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:655.1_8: **Pacchājātaṁ**—cittaṁ purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:656.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:657.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:657.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—cittaṁ cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:657.1_5: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:658.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:658.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:659.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:659.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:659.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:660.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:661.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— cittasahabhū eko khandho …pe….
patthana2.10:662.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:663.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—cittasahabhū eko khandho …pe….
patthana2.10:664.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:665.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:666.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:667.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:667.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:668.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:668.1_3: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_4: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_5: **Sahajātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:668.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—cittasahabhū khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:669.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:670.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:672.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:673.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:674.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:675.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:676.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:677.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:678.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:679.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:680.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:681.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:682.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:683.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava. (Anulomamātikā kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:685.1_0: Cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittānuparivattiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittānuparivattiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:685.1_2: (Yathā cittasahabhūdukaṁ evaṁ imaṁ dukaṁ kātabbaṁ, ninnānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.10:687.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho;
patthana2.10:688.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:688.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:689.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:690.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:690.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:690.1_2: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:691.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:691.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:692.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:692.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:693.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:693.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:693.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:694.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:694.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:695.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:695.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:695.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:696.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:698.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:698.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:699.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:700.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:701.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:701.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:702.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:702.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:703.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:703.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:704.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:704.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:704.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:705.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ahetuke cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:705.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:706.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:707.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:708.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:708.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, cittaṁ paṭicca vatthu, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:709.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:710.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:714.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṅkhittaṁ) tīṇi.
patthana2.10:715.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:716.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā) tīṇi.
patthana2.10:717.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:717.1_1: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:718.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:719.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:719.1_1: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:720.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:721.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:722.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:722.1_2: cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:723.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:723.1_2: vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:724.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:724.1_2: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:724.1_3: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:725.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:725.1_2: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:726.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:727.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:728.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:729.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:731.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… .
patthana2.10:732.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:733.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… .
patthana2.10:734.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:735.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… .
patthana2.10:736.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:737.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:738.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:739.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:740.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:740.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:740.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:741.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:741.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:741.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:742.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti …pe…
patthana2.10:742.1_4: Yathā cittasahabhūduke ārammaṇaṁ evaṁ kātabbaṁ, ninnānākaraṇaṁ.
patthana2.10:743.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:744.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:745.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati.
patthana2.10:746.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (navapi pañhā cittasahabhūdukasadisā) …
patthana2.10:747.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:748.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (cittasahabhūdukasadisā, ninnānākaraṇaṁ.
patthana2.10:749.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:750.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:751.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:752.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:753.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:753.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:753.1_4: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:754.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:755.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭiccasadisā).
patthana2.10:755.1_1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:755.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:756.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:757.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:757.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:758.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:758.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:758.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:759.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:759.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:759.1_3: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:759.1_6: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca …pe…
patthana2.10:759.1_7: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:760.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:760.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:760.1_3: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:760.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:760.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:760.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:761.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:761.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca …pe…
patthana2.10:761.1_3: **Sahajāto**—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca …pe…
patthana2.10:761.1_4: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca …pe….
patthana2.10:762.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:764.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:765.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:766.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:767.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:768.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:769.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:770.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:771.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
