patthana2.10:772.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:773.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:774.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṁ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte ekaṁ, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:775.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava. (Sabbattha nava, anulomamātikā.)
patthana2.10:777.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:779.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:781.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:782.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:782.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:783.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:784.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:784.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:784.1_2: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:784.1_3: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:785.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:785.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:786.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:786.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:786.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:787.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:788.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:788.1_1: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:788.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:788.1_3: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca bāhiraṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca bāhirā khandhā.
patthana2.10:789.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:790.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:791.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:792.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:792.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:793.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:793.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:793.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:794.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:794.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:794.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe…
patthana2.10:795.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye nava, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:796.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:797.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:797.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:798.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:799.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:799.1_2: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:800.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:800.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:801.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:801.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:802.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:803.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:803.1_1: ahetukaṁ cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:803.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:803.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca bāhiraṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca bāhirā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:804.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:805.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:806.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:807.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā;
patthana2.10:807.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:808.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:808.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca bāhiraṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ, bāhire khandhe paṭicca vatthu, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:809.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:810.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:811.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:812.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—bāhire khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:813.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:814.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— cakkhuviññāṇaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:815.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:815.1_6: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe paṭicca cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:815.1_8: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti najhānapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:816.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:817.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne pañca, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.10:819.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava …pe…
patthana2.10:821.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:822.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:822.1_1: (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā, yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā bāhirā khandhā.
patthana2.10:822.1_2: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhire khandhe paccayā cittaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:822.1_3: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:822.1_4: vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:823.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:823.1_1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:823.1_2: cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, cittañca vatthuñca paccayā bāhirā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:823.1_3: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.10:824.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:824.1_2: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:824.1_6: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:825.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:825.1_3: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhire khandhe paccayā cittaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:825.1_4: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:826.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:827.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:827.1_2: bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:827.1_3: cittañca vatthuñca paccayā bāhirā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:827.1_4: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:828.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:829.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paccayā ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ, cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
patthana2.10:830.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.10:831.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:832.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:833.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:833.1_2: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhire khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:833.1_4: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:834.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.10:834.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:835.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:836.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:837.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:838.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo— paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:839.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bāhirā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:839.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:840.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:840.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:841.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cittaṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:841.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha bāhirā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:841.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:842.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:842.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo …pe…
patthana2.10:842.1_4: pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:842.1_8: nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:842.1_9: Ariyā bāhire pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe…
patthana2.10:842.1_13: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:842.1_14: Cetopariyañāṇena bāhiracittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe…
patthana2.10:842.1_18: bāhirā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:843.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:843.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:843.1_8: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:843.1_12: bāhirā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:844.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:844.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbaṁ kātabbaṁ).
patthana2.10:844.1_4: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:844.1_8: bāhirā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:845.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:846.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:847.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:847.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—cittādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:847.1_3: (Mūlaṁ.) **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ajjhattikaṁ cittaṁ garuṁ katvā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:848.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.10:849.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:850.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:851.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā bāhirā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:852.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:853.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:854.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:854.1_9: (Tīṇipi pūretvā kātabbā, cittassāti kātabbā, sampayuttakānañcāti kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:855.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:856.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:856.1_3: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:857.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:858.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:858.1_3: vipassati, taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:858.1_5: kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:859.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:859.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:860.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:860.1_5: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:861.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:861.1_4: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:861.1_5: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:862.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.10:862.1_2: kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:863.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.10:863.1_1: Cakkhāyatanañca vatthu ca bāhirānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:863.1_2: kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca bāhirānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:863.1_3: rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:863.1_4: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:864.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.10:864.1_1: Cakkhāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:864.1_3: rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:865.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:865.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa bāhirassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:865.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (evaṁ navapi pañhā kātabbā), āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:866.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:866.1_1: **Sahajātā**—bāhirā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:866.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—bāhirā cetanā vipākānaṁ bāhirānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:867.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:867.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—bāhirā cetanā vipākassa cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:868.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:868.1_1: **Sahajātā**—bāhirā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:868.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—bāhirā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:869.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā āhārā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:870.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhattikā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:870.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:870.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:871.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—bāhirā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:871.1_2: bāhiro kabaḷīkāro āhāro bāhirassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:872.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—bāhirā āhārā cittassa āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:872.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā āhārā cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:872.1_2: bāhiro kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattikassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:873.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— bāhirā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:873.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:873.1_2: bāhiro kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:874.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca āhārā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:875.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:875.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:876.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:877.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā indriyā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.10:878.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—ajjhattikā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:878.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:879.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:879.1_1: kāyindriyaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:880.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—bāhirā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:880.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, rūpajīvitindriyaṁ bāhirānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:881.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—bāhirā indriyā cittassa indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:881.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā indriyā cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, rūpajīvitindriyaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:882.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—bāhirā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:882.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, rūpajīvitindriyaṁ ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:883.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca indriyā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:884.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:884.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:884.1_3: kāyindriyañca dukkhindriyañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:885.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo, cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:886.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi …
patthana2.10:887.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:887.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:888.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:888.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa bāhirassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:889.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:889.1_1: **Sahajātā**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā khandhā ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:889.1_3: kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:889.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:890.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:890.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—bāhirā khandhā purejātassa imassa bāhirassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:891.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:891.1_1: **Sahajātā**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā khandhā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:891.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—bāhirā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:892.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:893.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:893.1_1: **Sahajātā**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:894.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:895.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:896.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:897.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:897.1_1: **Sahajātaṁ**—sahajātā ajjhattikā khandhā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:899.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:900.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:901.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:902.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:903.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:903.1_1: **Sahajātā**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:903.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:903.1_5: kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:903.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:903.1_9: **Pacchājātā**—ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:903.1_10: **Pacchājātā**—ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:904.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:904.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana2.10:905.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:905.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:906.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:907.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:909.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:910.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:911.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:912.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:913.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:914.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:915.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:916.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:917.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:918.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:919.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:920.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:922.1_0: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca noupādā khandhā.
patthana2.10:923.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:923.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā noupādā ca kaṭattārūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:924.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—noupādā khandhe paṭicca upādā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:924.1_2: mahābhūte paṭicca upādā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:925.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:926.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā, dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.10:927.1_0: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca noupādā khandhā.
patthana2.10:928.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:929.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:930.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:931.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—noupādā khandhe paṭicca upādā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, mahābhūte paṭicca upādā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:932.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā— noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:933.1_0: Anantarapaccayā tīṇi, samanantarapaccayā tīṇi, sahajātapaccayā pañca.
patthana2.10:934.1_0: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca noupādā khandhā.
patthana2.10:935.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:936.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā khandhe paṭicca vatthu.
patthana2.10:937.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti aññamaññapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā vatthu ca …pe…
patthana2.10:938.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.10:1006.1_16: noupādā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.10:1008.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1008.1_6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana2.10:1008.1_9: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1008.1_10: phoṭṭhabbe noupādā khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1008.1_11: **Sahajātādhipati**—noupādādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1009.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1010.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā ca noupādā ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1010.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—noupādādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1011.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā noupādā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ noupādā khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1013.1_0: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:1014.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.10:1014.1_2: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.10:1015.1_0: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1015.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:1016.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1017.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.10:1017.1_2: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca noupādā khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1018.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa noupādā kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1018.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Pacchājātā noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1018.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Pacchājātā noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1020.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:1020.1_1: **Sahajātā**—noupādā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1020.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—noupādā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1021.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:1021.1_1: **Sahajātā**—noupādā cetanā upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1022.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā ca noupādā ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.10:1022.1_1: **Sahajātā**—noupādā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1022.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—noupādā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1023.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko noupādā eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:1024.1_0: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa upādā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1024.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa noupādā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1024.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1025.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—noupādā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1026.1_0: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—rūpajīvitindriyaṁ upādā kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1026.1_2: kāyindriyaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa rūpajīvitindriyaṁ noupādā kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1026.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) **Rūpajīvitindriyaṁ**—upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1027.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana2.10:1028.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1029.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1030.1_0: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1031.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1031.1_1: **Sahajātā**—noupādā khandhā noupādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1031.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā khandhā noupādā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1031.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa noupādā kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1032.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1032.1_1: **Sahajātā**—noupādā khandhā upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1032.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1033.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1033.1_1: **Sahajātā**—noupādā khandhā upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1033.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1034.1_0: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1035.1_0: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1035.1_4: Purejātasadisaṁ ninnānākaraṇaṁ.) **Kabaḷīkāro āhāro**—imassa noupādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1036.1_0: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo— āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1036.1_1: **Kabaḷīkāro āhāro**—imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1036.1_2: **Rūpajīvitindriyaṁ**—upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1037.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1037.1_1: **Sahajāto**—noupādā eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1037.1_4: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1037.1_5: dve mahābhūtā dvinnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo (yāva asaññasattā).
patthana2.10:1037.1_9: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa noupādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1038.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1038.1_1: **Sahajātā**—noupādā khandhā upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1038.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1039.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā ca noupādā ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1039.1_1: **Sahajāto**—noupādā eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1039.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1040.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1040.1_1: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa upādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1040.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca upādā kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1041.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1041.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1041.1_3: noupādā eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1041.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1041.1_8: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca noupādā khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1041.1_9: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa noupādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1041.1_10: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca noupādā kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1042.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo—pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1042.1_1: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1042.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—noupādā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1043.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cha, indriye satta, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1045.1_0: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1046.1_0: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1047.1_0: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca āhārapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1048.1_0: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1049.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1050.1_0: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1051.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1052.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1053.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1054.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:1055.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṁ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1056.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1058.1_0: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:1058.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe upādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:1058.1_4: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:1059.1_0: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upādinne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:1060.1_0: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—upādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:1061.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— anupādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:1062.1_0: Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upādinne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:1063.1_0: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādinno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—upādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:1064.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— anupādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:1065.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā— anupādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:1066.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:1067.1_0: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādinno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ upādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:1067.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upādinnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:1067.1_4: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe…

patthana2.10:1180.1_0: Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.

patthana2.10:1180.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—upādinnā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1181.1_0: Upādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.10:1181.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—upādinnā khandhā purejātassa imassa anupādinnassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1182.1_0: Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.10:1187.1_0: Upādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana2.10:1188.1_0: Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ.

patthana2.10:1190.1_4: kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, anupādinnaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.10:1190.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—anupādinnā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1190.1_7: anupādinno **kabaḷīkāro āhāro**—imassa upādinnassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1191.1_0: Anupādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana2.10:1191.1_1: **Pacchājātā**—anupādinnā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1191.1_2: anupādinno **kabaḷīkāro āhāro** imassa upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1192.1_0: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā upādinnassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1192.1_2: anupādinnaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1192.1_4: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca upādinnānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1192.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—upādinnā khandhā ca anupādinno kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa upādinnassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1192.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—anupādinnā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1193.1_0: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā anupādinnassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana2.10:1193.1_1: **Sahajātā**—upādinnā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1193.1_2: **Sahajāto**—anupādinno eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1193.1_4: **Purejātaṁ**—anupādinnaṁ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca anupādinnānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:1193.1_5: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca anupādinnānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1193.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—upādinnā khandhā ca anupādinno kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa anupādinnassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1194.1_0: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1194.1_1: **Āhāraṁ**—upādinno ca anupādinno ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1195.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1196.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā dve, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cha, pacchājāte cha, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme pañca, vipāke cattāri, āhāre nava, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte cha, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1197.1_0: Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1198.1_0: Upādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1199.1_0: Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1200.1_0: Anupādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1201.1_0: Anupādinno dhammo upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1202.1_0: Anupādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:1203.1_0: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā upādinnassa dhammassa purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:1204.1_0: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā anupādinnassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana2.10:1205.1_0: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1206.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), naāhāre aṭṭha …pe…
patthana2.10:1206.1_1: nasampayutte nava, navippayutte nava, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:1207.1_1: naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye cattāri, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:1208.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā dve (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
